statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, total_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity, total_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity, total_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC
SELECT id, product_name, unit_price, quantity, total_amount FROM sales_data WHERE unit_price >= 50 AND quantity < 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, AVG(total_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT sales_id, sale_date, product_name FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 5000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM SalesData INNER JOIN Inventory ON SalesData.product_name = Inventory.product_name WHERE quantity < 50
SELECT sale_date, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY sale_date HAVING total_sales > 10000
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE SalesAmount > 1000
SELECT ProductName, SalesAmount FROM SalesData ORDER BY SalesAmount DESC
SELECT AVG(SalesAmount) AS AverageSales FROM SalesData
SELECT ProductName, SalesAmount FROM SalesData WHERE SalesAmount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalSales FROM SalesData
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE SalesAmount > 1000 ORDER BY SalesDate DESC
SELECT ProductName, SUM(SalesAmount) AS TotalSales FROM SalesData GROUP BY ProductName HAVING TotalSales > 5000
SELECT SalesID, ProductName, SalesAmount FROM SalesData WHERE SalesAmount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY SalesAmount ASC
SELECT ProductName, StockQuantity, LastStockUpdate FROM Inventory WHERE StockQuantity < 50 ORDER BY LastStockUpdate DESC
SELECT ProductName, ForecastDate, ForecastAmount FROM SalesForecast WHERE ForecastAmount < 100 ORDER BY ForecastAmount ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT forecast_date, predicted_sale_amount FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY predicted_sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, last_checked_date FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10 ORDER BY last_checked_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, product_name, predicted_sale_amount FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, forecast_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_name, forecast_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_details WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_history WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
